meanings.definition: To repeat or resume an action or performance.
meanings.sent1: She reprises her role in the school play every year.
meanings.sent2: The band reprises their hit song at every concert.
meanings.sent3: He reprises his funny dance move to entertain his friends.
meanings.sent4: The clock reprises its ticking sound, echoing through the room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reprises the important lesson to help the students remember.

meanings.sent1: The reprises of the play were always well-received by the audience.
meanings.sent2: The movie includes several reprises of the main theme.
meanings.sent3: The reprises of the magic trick amazed the children each time.
meanings.sent4: The reprises of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The reprises of the dance routine were flawless and captivating.
